name: search_and_highlight
description: Searches for a keyword in file and highlights the matching occurrences. Supported file types: .txt, .json, .jsonl.

file_path.description: The path to the file in which to search for the keyword.

limit.description: The maximum number of matches to return. Defaults to 10.

case_sensitive.description: Whether the search should be case-sensitive. Defaults to false.
